entry.title: France reaffirms defense cooperation with Armenia, defying Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: France reaffirms defense cooperation with Armenia, defying Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
üìç French Ambassador Olivier Decottignies confirmed that France will continue its defense partnership with Armenia despite recent demands from Azerbaijan. üìç Armenia‚Äôs residential real estate market may be cooling off after two years of unprecedented growth, according to Andranik Harutyunov, a member of the Armenian Real Estate Agencies Association Council. üìç CivilNet‚Äôs fact-checking unit has become the first Armenian member of the European Fact-Checking Standards Network. üìç Unmasking the Kremlin-Baku tensions: https://youtu.be/GohYLfndwUk?si=kk-wsGvVFCdKNeON

media:group.media:title: Tackling Armenia‚Äôs educational shortcomings
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, host Patrick Elliott sits down with Larisa Hovhannisyan, the founder of Teach For Armenia, to explore the organization's efforts to deliver quality education in the country's remote and underserved communities. Hovhannisyan shares insights on the unique challenges facing rural schools, the government's ongoing education reforms, and the gaps between the current system and the skills needed for the modern Armenian economy.

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs economy grows by 5.9% in 2024: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs economy grows by 5.9% in 2024: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
üìç Armenia‚Äôs gross domestic product increased by 5.9% in 2024 ‚Äî a substantial growth rate, despite falling significantly from the previous year‚Äôs 8.3% economic expansion. üìç Plans by Armenia‚Äôs national electric utility to overhaul Yerevan‚Äôs power grid are expected to reduce the frequency of outages by up to 98%, a senior executive told CivilNet. Read more: https://shorturl.at/cIX49 üìç A CivilNet investigation has revealed that the Armenian government has opened a new criminal case connected to the Zangezur Copper-Molybdenum Combine, alleging the enterprise extracted more ore from the mine than contractually allowed. The development had not been reported publicly. Read more: https://shorturl.at/LghzX

entry.title: La municipalit√© de J√©rusalem veut saisir les biens du Patriarcat arm√©nien #shorts

media:group.media:title: La municipalit√© de J√©rusalem veut saisir les biens du Patriarcat arm√©nien #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Les Arm√©niens de J√©rusalem tirent la sonnette d‚Äôalarme: l‚Äôavenir du quartier arm√©nien et de la pr√©sence arm√©nienne √† J√©rusalem depuis 1600 ans sont tous deux en danger.
Le Patriarcat arm√©nien de J√©rusalem met en garde contre une tentative de la municipalit√© de J√©rusalem de saisir et de vendre aux ench√®res ses propri√©t√©s. Ces derni√®res sont situ√©es √† l'ext√©rieur de la vieille ville, √† J√©rusalem-Ouest. La raison avanc√©e serait des taxes fonci√®res impay√©es depuis des d√©cennies.

entry.title: De fortes chutes de neige paralysent Erevan #shorts

media:group.media:title: De fortes chutes de neige paralysent Erevan #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Erevan se trouve paralys√©e par de fortes chutes de neige depuis le 21 f√©vrier. Cela faisait pr√®s de dix ans qu‚Äôun tel ph√©nom√®ne ne s‚Äô√©tait pas produit dans la capitale arm√©nienne.
Tout le syst√®me de transport public est quasiment √† l‚Äôarr√™t dans la ville.

entry.title: Russian police accused of pressuring suspect in Yerevan

media:group.media:title: Russian police accused of pressuring suspect in Yerevan
media:group.media:description:
üìç The Yerevan municipality faces criticism after the city‚Äôs transportation system failed to handle yesterday‚Äôs snowstorm. üìç Civil society questions why Russian police were able to allegedly enter a police station in Yerevan last week to persuade Russian national Roman Shklover to surrender. üìç Fallout from the suspension of USAID funding is particularly impacting the media sector and its ability to conduct investigative journalism.
